fast3d.complex.light

Interface Light

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AmbientLight, DirectionalLight, ObstructableLight, PointLight, SpecularLight

    public interface Light
    some surfaces can offer data to calculate an almost realistic shadow- or light- effects
    Author:
    Tim Trense

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Color illuminate(Illuminatable illum)
      calculates the visible color for the given illuminatable;
      the visible color is the color of the pixels on the screen for the given renderable

    • Method Detail

      • illuminate

        Color illuminate(Illuminatable illum)
        calculates the visible color for the given illuminatable;
        the visible color is the color of the pixels on the screen for the given renderable
        Parameters:
        illum - the illuminatable giving the data of its surface
        Returns:
        the visible color to draw the illuminatable in if no other light is used
